where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF.items| ( SIZEOF ([ 'AIC_CSG.CSG_SOLID', 'AIC_CSG.MAPPED_ITEM', 'AIC_CSG.AXIS2_PLACEMENT_3D', 'AIC_CSG.SOLID_REPLICA', 'AIC_CSG.REVOLVED_FACE_SOLID', 'AIC_CSG.EXTRUDED_FACE_SOLID' ] * TYPEOF (it)) <> 1) )) = 0
where.label: WR2

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( mi <* QUERY ( it <* SELF.items| ('AIC_CSG.MAPPED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF (it)) )| NOT ('AIC_CSG.CSG_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF (mi\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation)) )) = 0
where.label: WR3

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( sr <* QUERY ( it <* SELF.items| ('AIC_CSG.SOLID_REPLICA' IN TYPEOF (it)) )| ( SIZEOF ([ 'AIC_CSG.CSG_SOLID', 'AIC_CSG.REVOLVED_FACE_SOLID', 'AIC_CSG.EXTRUDED_FACE_SOLID' ] * TYPEOF (sr\solid_replica.parent_solid)) = 0) )) = 0
where.label: WR4

where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF.items| NOT ('AIC_CSG.AXIS2_PLACEMENT_3D' IN TYPEOF (it)) )) > 0
where.label: WR5
